overlay.behemoths.voting_progress: Voting in progress. Press [%s] to open voting screen.
pandemonium_modifier.behemoths.archzombi: Archzombies now sometimes spawn with shields. Shielded Archzombies block a player when there is a nearby leader riding a Banishing Stampede.
Banishing Stampede chasing speed: x1.3. Normal Archzombies riding Banishing Stampedes can now also ram.
Chance for Banishing Stampede to spawn along a non-leader Archzombie: 5% -> 25%. Stampede ram damage: x2.
pandemonium_modifier.behemoths.player_da: Player damage is now decreased by 20% against all entities.
pandemonium_modifier.behemoths.zombie_ba: Baby zombie spawn chance will now significantly increase.
pandemonium_modifier.behemoths.zombie_re: Normal zombies will now gain a small chance to revive to full health upon death.
screen.behemoths.curse_selection.title: SELECT YOUR CURSE.
